segments.text: I glance at the kitchen and spot the woman by the sink first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's holding a plate, towel in hand, totally engrossed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize the faucet is on full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's pouring over the edge—how did I miss that?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle's spreading fast across the floor tiles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now I see the boy on the stool, arm deep in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tipping back—oh gosh, he's going to fall!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him has her palm up, expecting a cookie any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so sneaky, doing this right behind the woman's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a serene garden, bushes lining a path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets are open, framing the boy's precarious climb.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This setup is full of surprises, from flood to theft.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will turn and catch them in the act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a bustling, unexpected scene this kitchen holds.
segments.speaker: PAR
